title: Sparkling Suze Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Sparkling Suze Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
ounce
Suze
1 1/4
ounces
St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur
4
ounces
chilled
Cava
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Add Suze and St-Germain to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a Champagne flute and top with Cava. Garnish with lemon twist.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, strainer
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
Champagne
